o3-mini-2025-01-31.patternDescription: The aliens placed their symbols only in special spots in a 5x5 grid ‚Äì at the four corners, near the inner edges, and a center cell ‚Äì which together form a neat, mirror‚Äêimage pattern. The solution is obtained by picking out just those non-blank cells in a specific order and arranging them into a 3x3 grid. o3-mini-2025-01-31.solvingStrategy: Step 1: Notice that almost every cell is empty (represented as ‚¨õ) except those in symmetric positions along the edges and the center. Step 2: Identify the non-blank symbols (when thinking in numbers, these are nonzero values). Step 3: Extract them in this order: first row uses the top left corner, then a value from just inside the top-left (second row, second column), and the top right corner; next, take the inner side value from the upper half (row 2, column close to right) then the very center, then a mirror value from the lower half; finally, take the bottom left, then a lower mirror, and the bottom right. Step 4: Arrange them into a new 3x3 grid. (It might help to think of the puzzle first as numbers, and then map those numbers to the corresponding emojis.)
hints: Notice the symmetry: the nonempty cells appear in mirrored positions.
